Text: The Beggars' Guild:  They create music in the style of bands such as Tom Petty, Bruce Springsteen, Counting Crows, Led Zeppelin, Johnny Cash, Rolling Stones, Black Crowes, Pedro The Lion, Rich Mullins, Cracker, and Del Amitri.
